trans-unit.source: A full featured Tk-based knot and link editor
trans-unit.target: Полнофункциональный редактор узлов и ссылок на основе Tk.

trans-unit.source: PLink is a full featured graphical editor for knot and link projections, using the cross-platform GUI toolkit Tk. The primary focus is on piecewise-linear link projections, but it also supports a “smooth mode” and can export images in PostScript, PDF, SVG, and TikZ formats. See the PLink home page for complete details.
trans-unit.target: PLink is a full featured graphical editor for knot and link projections, using the cross-platform GUI toolkit Tk. The primary focus is on piecewise-linear link projections, but it also supports a “smooth mode” and can export images in PostScript, PDF, SVG, and TikZ formats. See the PLink home page for complete details.

trans-unit.source: This is a pure Python module and you can install it via pip. See the documentation for more.
trans-unit.target: This is a pure Python module and you can install it via pip. See the documentation for more.
